original_title: First tranche of World Bank aid to be used for budgetary support
original_body_lines: The first tranche of the World Bank's USD 700 million budgetary and welfare support arrives today, State Finance Minister Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said.
"USD 250 million will be received under the first tranche today as budgetary support," he said.
Another USD 250 million in budgetary support will be offered in October.
Meanwhile, the remaining USD 200 million will be for welfare support earmarked for those worst hit by the financial crisis, under the 'Aswesuma' programme he added.
